channel.title: How can I add sound/audio on my client?
channel.description:
I would really like to add music in the background on my client and also sound when people hit monsters and level up and stuff. Sounds for weapons when they slash and sounds when the monster gets hit. Y'know the usual.
Can anyone PLEASE tell me what to do? :)

item.title: How can I add sound/audio on my client?
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

Try using the search button, there is a tutorial on moparscape forums somewhere.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I add sound/audio on my client?
